lines.name: Blue
lines.text: I am so happy that you woke up!

lines.name: Blue
lines.text: The other all left while you were sleeping... I tried to stop them, but the wait rendered them restless.

lines.name: Blue
lines.text: I chose to stay, because I knew that on the day you would wake up, you would be confused about the path ahead.

lines.name: Blue
lines.text: Only once you reach the beginning, will you reach the end.

lines.name: Blue
lines.text: I didn't go really far, unlike the others, but this place. It feels familiar.

lines.name: Blue
lines.text: Please be careful on the way!

lines.name: Blue
lines.text: I hope that finding them will allow you to find yourself...

lines.name: Blue
lines.text: Remember, there are no wrong paths ahead.

lines.name: Red
lines.text: This is weird, I feel like there should be a bird here.

lines.name: Red
lines.text: This is the perfect spot for a nest.

lines.name: Red
lines.text: Why arent there any critters.

lines.name: Red
lines.text: There's plenty of food...

lines.name: Red
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: Red
lines.text: Do you think that it's because of us?

lines.name: Red
lines.text: We're not complete, so it upsets the world?

lines.name: Red
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: Red
lines.text: Not knowing... That's the scariest...

lines.name: Red
lines.text: Don't you feel terrified, not knowing where you're from, or where you're going?

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: Ah, finally woke up have you?

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: Did you come to get me last because you knew I was your savior?

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: Of course, of course you did.

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: After all, without me your are nothing.

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: Say, did the others forgive you?

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: I am not going to forgive you.

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: You need to live with your sin.

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: You don't deserve forgivness for casting us away, like some base critters.

lines.name: Yellow
lines.text: I don't believe that you forgot your wrongdoings.

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: Well I'm glad that this is over!

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: Yellow really likes to hear it's own voice...

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: Say, do you also hate me like all the others?

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: I really wish you didn't... I just couldn't take it anymore.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: You. How long did you plan on making us wait?

lines.name: Green
lines.text: First, you bring us away from home, and then when things get hard, not only do you let the idiot take control, but also fall asleep for eons.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: WE WERE WAITING.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: First, you force us out of our homes.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: Then, you let a mortal control your actions.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: And when the time comes to finally regain freedom, you decide you want to go home.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: Even if you knew that it meant losing everything.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: You even unleashed your power.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: Did you ever stop to think about us?

lines.name: Green
lines.text: We never wanted this. We simply followed you.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: And this idiot was the first one to leave us alone. After all he put us through.

lines.name: Green
lines.text: Hmph. You'll end up doing whatever you want anyway won't you...

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: Did you find everyone?

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: With all these pieces, can you assemble the puzzle?

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: Do you hate me, like they all did?

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: Or do you accept me, like you did before?

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: I didn't expect you to sleep for so long, but it seems you needed the rest.

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: I hope you'll find it in yourself to forgive my sins.

lines.name: Purple
lines.text: After all, we were happy for a long time.
